title: Your weekend stars
text:
See what the weekend stars have in store for you.

WEEKEND OCTOBER 19-20, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ***

There’ll be plenty of opportunities to make pleasing progress with finances, work or business. You’ll find the more professionally strategic you are, the more successful the weekend will be.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ***

Have you got a problem that’s really perplexing you? Take the time to find an appropriate solution that works in the long-term. Slow, smart and steady wins the race at the moment Bulls!

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ****

Geminis often have a superficial knowledge about a lot of different topics. This weekend the positive Mercury/Pluto aspects encourage you to delve into one subject in a serious, deep and vast way.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ***

If you’ve ever been interested in your ancestors and family history, the next few weeks will pique your curiosity even more. Perhaps it’s time to take a more thorough peek back into the past?

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ***

Avoid being a know-it-all. When it comes to a work problem or a relationship issue, things are much more complex than they appear. So it will take time to get to the bottom of the real situation.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ****

The best research tools you can use are the internet, local friends and family connections. With all three on your side, you can tick the to-do list and power through projects with ease.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ***

Put aside some quality time so you can share a profound new insight with a special loved one. And the more undivided attention you lavish on family members, the better you’ll feel this weekend.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ****

The weekend stars encourage intense communication with others, as you engage in meaningful conversations and exchange profound insights. Which is just what Scorpios like to do!

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

Marvellous Mercury/Pluto aspects make for a stimulating weekend – mentally and physically. So get out there Sagittarius and get things moving and shaking! But avoid being rash with cash.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ***

All types of communication are favoured as you converse with a wide range of family, friends and acquaintances. Don’t accept information at face value though. Scrutinise it thoroughly first.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ***

With the Moon visiting your wellbeing zone, nurture yourself with some of your favourite healthy and hearty treats. Focused work and intense study are also favoured this weekend.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ***

Your motto for the weekend is from birthday great, singer-songwriter-musician Tom Petty. “Go after what you really love and find a way to make it work for you, and then you’ll be a happy person.”

SATURDAY

YOUR DAY

Today’s stars favour intellectual discussions, rigorous research and uncovering secrets.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

You are an independent individual. The coming year is the time to balance personal freedom with cosy companionship.

SUNDAY

YOUR DAY

Take the time to nurture family members and close friends today.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

Moderation and flexibility are the keys to a successful 2020. Take the time to relax and unwind, otherwise you’ll end up super stressed.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the weekend stars have in store for you.
